content:
Mathlib 4 wiki mentions something called "theory development" multiple times, such as "Porting theory development is helpful for tactic porting" or "There is (hopefully!!!) lots of latent enthusiasm for putting in the work to port the theory development in mathlib3.".
Does theory development mean porting the actual mathematical definitions/theorems/etc., e.g. stuff in Mathlib's /Logic, /CategoryTheory, /Algebra folders?
Yes, that's correct. Certain tactics need a somewhat substantial amount of mathematical theory to be written (e.g., linarith) before the tactic can be written and function.
Evgenia Karunus has marked this topic as resolved.
